abstract: Countrywide Financial, the mortgage lender and loan servicer, reported a fourth-quarter loss of $422 million Tuesday, but the results were not expected to hinder its proposed $4.1 billion takeover by the Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: Countrywide Financial, the mortgage lender and loan servicer, reported a fourth-quarter loss of $422 million Tuesday, but the results were not expected to hinder its proposed $4.1 billion takeover by the Bank of America.

headline.main: Countrywide Posts $422 Million Loss, but Deal Is Still a Go
